location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 105: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Tehran. The letters (nos. 86, 89, 90 and 99) are not included here, but they do appear earlier in the file as individual items (see ff.39-40, f.42, ff.43-45 and f.46 respectively).
